_comment: Created by EFisher on 03/12/2015 13:08:33 using v2.7
title: Did patients know how to contact an out-of hours GP service when their surgery is closed?
analysis_commentary: In 2012/13, 58% of patients said that they knew how to contact out-of-hours GP services (patients were asked about contacting an out-of hours GP service when their GP surgery was closed and to exclude NHS Direct, NHS walk-in centres or A&E). This is not an improvement on the year before and there is still a large percentage of patients who do not know how to contact out-of-hours GP services.
